title: 1. What services does Nexus Digitals offer?
text: We offer comprehensive digital services including website development, logo design, e-commerce solutions, mobile app development, digital marketing, SEO services, animation, illustration, marketing collateral, and creative copywriting.

title: 2. How long does a typical website development project take?
text: Project timelines vary based on complexity and requirements. A basic website typically takes 2-4 weeks, while more complex e-commerce or custom applications may take 6-12 weeks. We provide detailed timelines during our initial consultation.

title: 3. Do you provide ongoing support and maintenance?
text: Yes, we offer comprehensive support and maintenance packages to ensure your digital assets continue to perform optimally. This includes regular updates, security monitoring, performance optimization, and technical support.

title: 4. Can you help improve my website's search engine ranking?
text: Absolutely! Our SEO services include keyword research, on-page optimization, technical SEO audits, content strategy, and link building campaigns designed to improve your search engine visibility and organic traffic.
